articles.author: David W. Brown
articles.title: This Robot’s Journey to an Icy Alien Moon Starts Beneath Antarctica
articles.description: NASA scientists completed field tests in November of a floating rover they hope will one day travel to Europa, the frozen ocean moon of Jupiter.
articles.content: On Europa, the real action is in its ocean; if at last the Jovian moon does get a rover that could get beneath its surface, it makes sense that the robot would crawl on the underside of its ice shell. The radiation chemistry and geophysics of Europas surface … [+1360 chars]

articles.author: Nicholas Bogel-Burroughs
articles.title: For a Post-9/11 Generation, War Isn’t New but Fears of Another One Are
articles.description: As tensions escalated between the United States and Iran, young people had to come to terms with the possibility that for the first time, their generation would be on the front lines.
articles.content: We all talked about it this morning and I tried to relax them, saying theres not going to be a war, Ms. Patterson said on Saturday. I like to be very, very honest with my children, but I dont want them to worry about that. Thats for the adults right now. Its … [+1418 chars]

articles.title: Taekwondo Gave 2 Children an Outlet. It Gave Their Mother a Break.
articles.description: Frances Ramirez was juggling three jobs with her responsibilities as a single parent when she got help paying for her children’s lessons.
articles.content: Because Ms. Ramirez cannot afford her own home, she and her children share a one-bedroom apartment with her mother in a public housing complex on the Lower East Side of Manhattan. (Ms. Ramirez is on a waiting list for an apartment.) Tempers tend to run short,… [+1196 chars]

articles.description: The therapist-patient relationship seemed like a place for re-examination in the age of #MeToo.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Car Plows Into German Tourists in Northern Italy, 6 Dead
articles.description: The Italian police were quoted as saying that the driver was believed to be from the area and had a high alcohol blood content.
articles.content:
ROME A car plowed into a group of young German tourists in northern Italy early Sunday, killing six people and injuring 11, Italian fire officials said.
The deadly crash occurred in a village near Valle Aurina, near Bolzano in the South Tyrol region, shortly… [+371 chars]

articles.author: Amber Bracken and Megan Specia
articles.title: Giving Birth Where the Family Is
articles.description: Canada’s government once pressured Inuit women to travel south to give birth. Now, they can have their babies at a hometown maternity clinic led by Inuit midwives.
articles.content:
When Megan Epoo, the niece of the midwife Brenda Epoo, became pregnant, her aunt served as her midwife, and, along with other women in her family, guided her through her pregnancy.
Her daughter, Hailey, is now 9. On a recent day, she and a friend skipped roc… [+996 chars]

articles.description: Out to dinner on a crisp fall night, a sandwich to go and more reader tales of New York City in this week’s Metropolitan Diary.
articles.content:

articles.title: Al Shabab Says It Attacked Kenyan Base Used by U.S.
articles.description: An official in Kenya said the strike, which the terrorist group characterized as a dawn raid, had been repulsed.
articles.content:
NAIROBI, Kenya Al Shabab, the Somali terrorist group, on Sunday attacked a military base in Kenya that is used by both American and Kenyan forces, the militants said.
